responseHash.description: A SHA256 hash used to identify this response.

pollHash.description: The poll which this response belongs to.

timestamp.description: A timestamp representing when the respondent created this response.

rewardAddr.description: The address which rewards should be credited to, used for credit relaying.

signature.description: The ECDSA signature of the respondent to signify that it is them who made this response (512B).

responseData.description: An array of responses made to this poll, further validation based off poll metadata.

respondentDemographics.description: An array of demographics belonging to the respondent
